# Distribution Build

This directory (`dist/`) contains the compiled and minified production assets generated by the build process.

## âš ï¸ Do Not Edit
**Do not edit files in this directory directly.**
These files are automatically generated from the source code in `src/`. Any changes made here will be overwritten the next time `npm run build` is executed.

## ğŸ“‚ Content
- **`main.js`**: Bundled JavaScript for the Web App.
- **`miniapp.js`**: Bundled JavaScript for the Farcaster Mini App.
- **`index.html`**: Processed HTML entry point for Web.
- **`miniapp.html`**: Processed HTML entry point for Mini App.
- **`assets/`**: Copied static assets.

## ğŸ›  Generation
To regenerate this folder:
```bash
npm run build
```
